oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Nashville's Easter Fashion Parade, 1936 April 12
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of a couple leaving a downtown Nashville church in their Easter finery. Similar photos appeared in the Nashville Banner newspaper April 13, 1936. Forms part of the Nashville Banner Archives. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 3.25 x 4.25 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Architecture; Buildings; Capital City; Downtown Nashville; Popular Culture; Religion; Clothing and dress--Tennessee--Nashville; Women's clothing--Tennessee--Nashville; Women's hats--Tennessee--Nashville; Easter--Tennessee--Nashville; Men's clothing--Tennessee--Nashville; Church buildings--Tennessee--Nashville; Married people--Tennessee--Nashville
Nashville (Tenn.)--History--Sources; Nashville (Tenn.)--Social life and customs
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Banner staff photographer
